links.title: Porsche's stunning Tesla rival may be cheaper than expected
links.description: Porsche's Mission E may start at $75,000, around $10,000 less than expected. The company's first fully-electric car is set to be released in 2019. The Mission E is expected to come in three models that range from 402 to 670 horsepower. Porsche is set to release its first fully-electric car, the Mission E, in 2019.

links.title: What's Next For Tesla Inc (TSLA) In 2018?
links.description: Despite a late-year cooling off period, Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) shares enjoyed a banner 2017. The stock surged over 45% this year, in fact, doubling the performance of the benchmark S&P 500. This strong performance came despite a bevy of well-publicized speed bumps, including weak Model 3 production and very little progress with its self-driving system, Autopilot.
